entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, introduced as he shivers and draws his robes tightly around him. ("As Harry shivered and drew his robes tightly around him...")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's, mentioned in the story as whispering to Harry about the music. ("‘Is that supposed to be music?’ Ron whispered.")

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick is a ghost who welcomes Harry and Ron to the party. ("‘My dear friends,’ he said mournfully , ‘welcome, welcome ... so pleased you could come ...’")

entities.name: deathday party 101
entities.description: The Deathday Party is an event where hundreds of people are gathered to celebrate. ("It was an incredible sight. The dungeon was full of hundreds of pearly-white, translucent people...")

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends, as evidenced by their interaction in the story. ("‘Is that supposed to be music?’ Ron whispered.")
Nearly Headless Nick is hosting a party for Harry and Ron, as he welcomes them. ("‘My dear friends,’ he said mournfully , ‘welcome, welcome ... so pleased you could come ...’")
Nearly Headless Nick is hosting a party for Ron as well. ("‘My dear friends,’ he said mournfully , ‘welcome, welcome ... so pleased you could come ...’")
